name: The Game Of The Games
description:
You are a guy who wants to play a game.
Do you want to play a game? You will play a game. In this game, you will play a game. As a guy trying to play a game. Or die trying to do it.

[Game made for the $105 Adventure Game Challenge Game Jam. I plan on releasing a extended version later to make it a more polished and complete game (including some ideas, dialogues and endings that didn't make it in time for the Jam version version].
